content.label: This interactive fiction/game is just superb. With cheats you could probably tear through it very quickly, but you'd be missing the point--unraveling a story, exploring the town, and ultimately finishing with the best combination of items to give you a leg up in part 3 are what this is about. Worth every penny for folks who love RPGs. One of the very best and somehow even better than part 1!
By far the best app I have ever bought. I couldn't put it down.
This story is very well laid out and the famous youtubers the Yogscast did a lets play of this game. It was very enjoyable and interesting and it intrigued me to buy it. 5 out of 5 for amazing story.

I played the Sorcery! game books as a kid, and this app is even better than the original source material (which I loved).  The minor bugs I previously encountered all seem to have been fixed.  My only minor critique is that I would like to be able to delete some of the cloud-saved games.
Loved it only problem was the part where you had to kiss a cross on cougar's face confused me.
This is the one of the best iOS games to date and I can't wait for the next one! It has some great story telling, a fun combat system, a ton of interesting spells, and choices that really matter.

This is, without a doubt, one of the greatest games created for iOS. The story is gripping, the writing is great, and the level of freedom within the game world is unrivaled.

Be sure to start with the first Sorcery!, as your character carries over. Certain items from the first game open up possibilities in the next one that are otherwise unreachable. I eagerly await Sorcery! 3.
Awesome game!

From the music and sound effects, to the drawings, detail, and the amount of love that anyone can see was put into this little gem, I was hooked. Plus a great value for the price- I easily played for 16 hours- probably could have done even more if I explored everywhere available to you in the city, as I was looking for clues. Can't wait for #3!!!!!

title.label: An incredible adaption - but welcoming for newcomers - a must play!

content.label:
I can never find "that perfect app" to get, I'm constantly re-playing the older big name stuff because everything new is disappointing. 

I've been blown away. It is a simple game with graphics that are so nonanimated as to be almost confusing to why you'd pay $2.99, and then you start playing and really see all the beautiful artwork illustrating the story and the hundreds of pages of scripts that detail the thousands of possibilities. If you love high adventure, this game is FOR YOU. The story asks you where to go, what to do, wraps around you, and remembers your choices three hours later - and even asks you to do the same! If that isn't attention to detail, then I don't know what is - and isn't that what we are begging for in games, for the makers to give us SUBSTANCE, not just happy graphics and a ten-minute shoot-em-up? For your dollar you get all the replay ability of a story that can't be played the same way twice, and a guarantee of no in-app purchases. 

I'm sold, and I loved both episodes. I cannot wait for episodes three and four. For anyone that says "too short" or "what? Another chapter?" Realize that it was planned as a series and you paid what you paid for a really good interactive book.
I don't know what to say. This game is amazing. There are tones of layers to the story. The gameplay is great, and combat is fun. Do yourself a favor and buy this right now.
The music, the writing, and the wood block style artwork all make this game wonderful.  Definitely a top 5 game for me.
This i worth the money its a great story and a great way to spend time and i thought d&d was fun. I cant wait for part 3.

title.label: Amazing game, I recommend it to people who like RPGs

content.label: Very very good and fun, I love the puzzles and the fighting is amazing

Such a great game. Kind of like choose your own adventure books meet dungeons and dragons! I have spent more time playing this than playing titanfall! Lol. -all kidding aside this is an amazing little masterpiece. I want to find the books to find out how they work. Can't wait for part 3.

My son loves this game, but there is one problem... the clues!  My son got to the north gate and traveled back in time but he replayed the entire adventure and he still could not find all the clues!  Then when he figured out how to get away from the city without the clues, he was cursed!  So please make the next game have les or no clues to find. Thank You.
If you're imaginative and love a good story this is the game for you

This game is so much fun.  It has tons of cool mechanics that give it that adventure/decide your destiny style game book.
      Haven't finished it yet, but I can't wait till part three.
    P.S. It was worth every cent of the 4.99 as long as u played sorcery 1 before hand.
    P.P.S. You need to thank the yogscast soooo much, your game would have none of it's well deserved popularity without them!
Seriously great game, im looking forward to #3!
I played the first one and carried on the story it was the best app I've ever played I completed the game in two runs and never played swindle stones XD
It's amazing. Such a huge, memorable adventure.

title.label: We want to plat this game other languages especially korean

content.label: It is my best game app ever
Very good game.

title.label: An memorable trek through a unique city

content.label:
Saying that Sorcery is an adaptation of a gamebook would be barely scratching the surface. It's a book, it's an RPG, it's an adventure game. Above all, this episode is an exploration of a vast city filled with memorable characters and locations, with countless adventures to have, secrets to uncover and traps to avoid.

This episode has all the features that made the first one great, and addresses some of its shortcomings. Those who found the first one too short and easy will have much more of a challenge this time - and might be tempted to go back to part 1 to prepare better. And those who've already gone through the books will find the city subtly changed (and more than a little expanded) from what they remember.

Sorcery 2 is a magnificent game with tons of charm, polish and replay value, and I can't recommend it enough.

title.label: The best IOS game I have played

content.label: This game is a true masterpiece that gives hours of enjoyable gameplay. I would prefer to play this over a much more expensive game for the PC. I strongly suggest this game.

An excellent adaptation of a very fun adventure book.  With difficult choices, fascinating lore, and an exciting and streamlined combat system, this is one of the very best games on the App Store.  Buy it.  You won't regret it.

Personally, I've been having trouble finding a great game for mobile. One with a great story line, memorable characters, and lots of replay ability. Thats why I'm so glad I found Sorcery. 

There's so many things to do in this game, and so many ways to do them. And I really love the cloud save feature.

If I had to say anything bad about this game, I'd say that it is kind of awkward drawing a path between locations. I'd much rather just tap.

This game can keep me preoccupied during long trips, and when I'm in my living room. Thats why I give this game 9.5/10.
I wish Apple did a better job of marketing this game. Game play is unique, sort of like a visual choose your own adventure that incorporates RPG elements. Can't wait for Sorcery! 3.
Should be way more popular, let's get this game to the most popular on the App Store!

Amazing game, really. My only gripe is that to successfully "beat" the game is/can be extremely difficult and will take many rewinds and whole playthroughs to accomplish. This should really be more popular.

Amazing game, really. My only gripe is that to successfully "beat" the game is/can be extremely difficult and will take many rewinds and whole playthroughs to accomplish. This should really be more popular.
Just download it already!
This game was amazing but I really want to continue the story and finish it

title.label: One of the best game books of all time!

content.label: I couldn't wait for this one, as it was my favorite gamebook as a kid. Inkle did a fantastic job bringing Khare to life. Can't wait for the Seven Serpents!
Very good job putting it together! Highly recommended! Sounds are an awesome touch, you guys nailed the presentation!
If anybody who works at the App Store sees this, get this game some visibility, it deserves it.
This app awesome! It offers hours of fun! Great rpg game!
So much longer than the first one! Too bad I have now lost 3 from my max stamina. Curse you time travel! WHEN IS THE NEXT ONE???

I loved this game so much and can't wait till the 3rd game :D
But thanks Yogscast for showing me this game!

title.label: Awesome rpg from an old book

content.label: I was surprised by how much I am enjoying this game. It really deserves more attention than it appears to be getting. Each scene can be played out in so many different ways. The game really makes me feel like I am the one on the adventure and all my decisions count. So far I have played the game for over 3 hours and it appears I am not even 1/4 of the way there. Definitely worth the $5, and I suggest buying the first game too because this is a direct continuation of it and all your progress saves.
Please I neeeeed more of your awsome games!!!!

I still own all of the original books, and I am amazed at how well designed this app is.  In addition, the ability to make the combat and mini-games interactive greatly enhance the experience.  I remember in high-school and college I had wanted to try and make a computer based version of the books.  My rudimentary understanding of programming and limited artistic ability clearly could not have come up with a game as elegant as this.  I can't wait to complete the series!
Thanks to the folks at Inkle for delivering an engaging, fun and challenging game.  I'm hooked!

Did not like the part at the end where I was told to go back and get all the clues. Takes too long to search and then I forgot everything I was looking for. Thought the game was a little overpriced. Overall, I thought it was just ok
I love this one even more than the first, it has so many different paths, there's swindlestones which you can win so much from, and I fell down a well, twice!
Really good RPG!!!!

This game actually has exceeded my standards because of many different reason. First of all I couldn't stop playing this game, and was very surprised about this, as I have never before played any type of game where you make your own choices this much, and I also have never read any of these types of books... I bought the second game, because I thought, why not buy the one that looks like it has better graphics... When I played for about an hour, I really started getting into it, and really liked the very nice pictures that accompany a lot of text... After I have actually now finished it, but am sure have not gone to all the places and watched all outcomes of conversations, etc. I regret not buying the first one and trying it out instead so I can go on with the story, but I can actually agree that this game is better than a lot of others these days, and I really did not mind reading the whole entire story as it was very intriguing. Overall, a great game, but you would have to figure out for yourself why it is so. The only thing that I kinda thought was a bit of cheating is that the game is $5, whilst I think it should maybe be a bit lower...

Sorcery! 2 - Khar, Cityport of Traps does not disappoint. In fact, the Sorcery game series has shown for a second time that it is the best choose your way RPG adventure. The story is marvelous, the art stylings are very unique, the puzzles and riddles make for hours of gameplay, and the overall story is amazing. You could not ask for a better original fantastic story of a brave adventurer. Thank you, inkle, for another beautiful installment, and I eagerly await Sorcery! 3 - The Seven Serpants.

I'm impressed and sad it's over

I'm incredibly picky, but aside from a tiny bug (dice disappear while gambling), I have nothing to criticize!

The way spells are cast is really cool, the battle system (tuen-based) is pretty cool, the artwork is a joy, the storyline is rewarding, the wealth of choose-your-own-adventure choices is staggering. I loved it.

I beat it in one day, but I did little else. The story was more than rich enough to make 12+ hours of gameplay worth it.

Can't wait for the next one. Thank you!
Best rpg in tw AppStore, only reason it dont get 5 stars is cuz it's overpriced, also I would like u to be able to buy good with actual money. Overall very good with nice plot.
